result.arabic_text: يَوۡمَ يَغۡشَىٰهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ مِن فَوۡقِهِمۡ وَمِن تَحۡتِ أَرۡجُلِهِمۡ وَيَقُولُ ذُوقُواْ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
result.translation: (55) On the Day the punishment will cover them from above them and from below their feet and it is said, "Taste [the result of] what you used to do."
